hero.title: Strengthen your relationship
hero.subtitle: Couple Check-In helps couples build stronger relationships through structured quarterly review sessions.

step1.title: 1. Prepare individually
step1.description: Reflect privately on thoughtful questions across 6 key relationship areas. Your answers remain completely private until your in-person session.

step2.title: 2. Connect in person
step2.description: Meet each quarter for a structured session where you discuss each question together. The app guides you through a two-pass system.

step3.title: 3. Act together
step3.description: Create concrete action items during your session. Track your commitments, celebrate accomplishments, and build momentum toward your relationship goals.

step4.title: 4. Track your progress
step4.description: Review your session history, revisit your past answers, and see how your relationship evolves over time.

feature6.description: Celebrate your journey together over time

why.title: Why quarterly reviews?
why.description: Research shows that couples who regularly reflect on their relationship experience higher satisfaction, better communication, and stronger emotional bonds. Couple Check-In makes this practice simple, structured, and sustainable.
why.audience3: Anyone wanting to move from "we should talk more" to actually talking meaningfully

testimonial1.name: Sophie & Marc
testimonial1.text: Quarterly reviews have transformed our communication. We finally take the time to truly listen. The app makes it simple and structured.

testimonial2.name: Julie & Alexandre
testimonial2.text: We thought everything was fine, but these questions helped us identify small things before they became problems. It's become our favorite ritual.

testimonial3.name: Amélie & David
testimonial3.text: After 8 years, we thought we knew everything about each other. Couple Check-In showed us there's always more to discover. The concrete actions make a real difference.

testimonial4.name: Caroline & Thomas
testimonial4.text: This app gave us a framework for having conversations we were avoiding. Now we look forward to our sessions with excitement.
